title: Mondraker Raze 130mm travel do-it-all Trail Bike is MIND telemetry equipped
content:
Mondraker are asking you to raise your expectations of what a 130mm travel trail bike can manage with the release of the all-new Mondraker Raze. It rolls up with a trail-specific kinematic promising the pedaling efficiency of an XC bike combined with the downhill capabilities of an enduro bike; quiver killer territory. The bike combines

The post Mondraker Raze 130mm travel do-it-all Trail Bike is MIND telemetry equipped appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
